data.title: Yuki no Hana
data.meta_description: Yuki no Hana (雪の華) is the 10th single by Nakashima Mika. It was released on June 21, 2004, and peaked at #3 on the Oricon single chart.[1] The lead track Yuki no Hana was used as the eighth ending theme for the anime ReLIFE. Catalog Number: AICL-1557 Lyrics: Satomi Composition: Matsumoto Ryoki...
data.text:
Yuki no Hana (雪の華) is the 10th single by Nakashima Mika. It was released on June 21, 2004, and peaked at #3 on the Oricon single chart.[1]

Single Information[]

The lead track Yuki no Hana was used as the eighth ending theme for the anime ReLIFE.

Catalog Number: AICL-1557

Lyrics: Satomi

Composition: Matsumoto Ryoki

Arrangement: Matsumoto Ryoki

Tracklist[]

Yuki no Hana (雪の華)

Yuki no Hana (Acoustic)

Yuki no Hana (REGGAE DISCO ROCKERS FLOWER'S MIX)

Yuki no Hana (Instrumental)

Audio[]

Covers[]

Fujita Maiko - Hore Uta (Track 10)

May J. - Heisei Love Song Covers (Track 7)

Nogawa Sakura - WINTER SONG COVER BEST (Track 5)

Videos[]
